Modern Textures.desc: Textures ported from the newer versions of Minecraft

Badge Fix.desc: Changes the 'Minecon' logo to an 'MCPI Approved' logo

Zombie Pigman Fix.desc: Fix to the Zombie Pigman layers not showing (only use with vanilla textures!)

Plastic Pack.desc: Recreation of the Minecraft Bedrock Plastic texture pack

Youdub Pack.desc: Youdub's modified texture pack based off 'Modern Textures'
